title: Mine!
description: MINE! “While others may categorize what he did as something different, something dirty, something evil. He considered what he did as a dance. A Devil’s Waltz, if you may.” Can one evil be greater than another? Is there truly a lesser of two evils? These are just a couple of the questions that S. E. Robinson tries to address within the pages of this compelling new story “MINE!” “MINE!” seeks to uncover the harrowing events that can occur when one evil is confronted by an older, wiser, greater evil. This story will take you to the Heartland of America as one meticulous, methodical, and prolific serial killer, murders a person who was the target of another. As a result, the slighted killer seeks revenge forcing a battle of wits that must conclude before either killer is caught. “MINE!” is a riveting story that keeps the reader engaged and compels the reader to wonder ‘what in the world can happen next?’ “MINE!” is a page-turner in every sense and begs the reader to come back for more.
author: S.E.  Robinson
